title: When banning  a champion in draft-pick their taunt should play.
body: As the title says, when you ban a champion in draft mode, it would be a nice touch for them to taunt everyone. How would everyone else feel about that?

replies.body:
''You will lose''
{{champion:54}}
Malph is pissed that you banned him
Rock solid ban
Love the idea. One problem. You are going to get troll bans just so people would hear there taunts. Example of troll ban - urgot
"Yes, that *was* a banana. Nobody expects the banana."
Sadly, that's her joke :(
"Do you always fight so poorly?" or "I will not save you."
The second one is so perfect too.

{{champion:84}} "So many noobs, Will matchmaking ever find true balance?"

Muahahaha
Except that is her joke, not her taunt...
this is exactly what went through my head when i read OP
ok?

Rammus doesn't have any VO for his taunt.

For his taunt, he just raises his hands.
A pair of Rammus hands appear around the icon and raise into the air before vanishing.

{{champion:45}} *You deny the darkness in your soul! You deny your power!*

Oh yes the absolutely perfect ear rape for everyone to hear.
{{champion:13}} LMAO Ryze "Take this scroll and stick it.... somewhere safe" I would be crying
"You only need to click once fool"
It'd be a neat addition. I would enjoy it for a couple rounds, but probably end up turning it off in the client settings (if we had the option).
Pretty much this. Add it anyway oh great Rito.
{{champion:35}} Why so serious?
Lol

{{champion:18}} Ta-Da!

Yeah, just going off of that and the fact that Rammus doesn't have any is enough to say that this probably won't as work as well as you think it will OP.
Ok

{{champion:105}} 
"Not interested"

Taunt or joke or laugh, whichever works best. Or Rammus just going "Hmm."
Because, let's face it, if for some inane reason somebody banned Singed, you'd wanna hear his laugh over "How'd that taste?"
Possibly get something special for champs where the taunts or jokes makes no sense
Like when Darius days "You will regret opposing me."?

Super stoked on that idea. Upvoted. Pick lobbies are kinda boring... a little something for laughs would be a good touch....
Or would it be.... *sings* A TOUCH TOOO MUCHHH!!!

"ok"
{{champion:33}}
I can see nocturn saying something along the lines I knew you feared me summoner
{{champion:33}}
OK...
{{champion:81}} : "You belong in a museum!"
{{champion:86}} DEMACIA WILL BE VICTORIUS!... but it is not this day.....
I would LOVE for this to happen.
I know Riot won't do this, but Riot: PLEASE DO THIS!
{{champion:16}} "i will not save you...."
You can not be saved from my Bananas.
{{champion:114}} "I like you, I'd hate to kill you"

{{champion:432}} 
*flies all over the champion select screen before landing in the bans section*
"You will regret opposing me."

{{champion:114}}  "I loooong for a worthy opponent." " Submit, you have already lost!"

{{champion:45}}  "Whats black and blue and about to show you the definition of pain?"

I would love this!!!
Specific ban quotes would be excellent
Yo skills are inferior!{{champion:11}}
I don't know if anyone has heard twitch's taunt in the Korean client. If you haven't....well you haven't lived...

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=031mgNe2OCA 
HOW CAN THIS NOT MAKE YOUR DAY

I would be so tempted to ban Akali every game for the trash talk.

{{champion:84}} "So many noobs... Will matchmaking ever find true balance?"
This is genius
